author: GameSpot
description:
If you're just starting out in Arc Raiders make sure to use the FREE Loadout. The Loadout is surprisingly generous, and it's often just as good an option or sometimes better than a threadbare loadout you might make especially early on when you don't have as much loot. Just keep in mind the Free Loadout acts an augment so you won't have an augmentation slot.

#arcraiders #gamespot
title: Arc Raiders Starter Tip To Know

author: GameSpot
description:
Nintendo has revealed that Animal Crossing: New Horizons will receive a Switch 2 Edition as well as a beefy new update on the original Switch. Planned to arrive January 15, the Switch 2 upgrade will cost $5 (if you already own the game) while version 3.0 on Switch will be a free patch.

#animalcrossingnewhorizons #animalcrossing #gamespot
title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Is Finally Getting New Content And Switch 2 Upgrade

author: GameSpot
description:
A new update for Animal Crossing New Horizons is on the way on January 15th, 2026 and its packed full of new content and even a Switch 2 Upgrade! Check out the details and what to expect in this official announcement trailer!

#nintendoswitch2 #nintendo #animalcrossing #newhorizons
title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons – 3.0 Update and Switch 2 Edition Overview Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Resident Evil Requiem is now available for pre-order!
 
In addition to the standard edition, a deluxe edition packed with extra content is also available to pre-order.
All pre-orders come with a bonus: Grace’s Costume: Apocalypse.
 
Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. 
 
Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core. Technological advancements combined with the development team's depth of experience combine in a story with rich characters and gameplay that's more immersive than ever before.
title: Resident Evil - Road to Requiem Game Overview
